section.title: Overview
section.lines: This page provides information on the Notification Bar within the Deployment Inventory Tool.

section.title: Purpose of this Feature
section.lines: This feature notifies the user of any ongoing issues within the tool. Such issues may include:

ul.li: Pending bug fix: If a bug exists in the tool, this Notification Bar will inform the user.
Third-party Software issues: If a third-party piece of software is undergoing maintenance, has a bug or is offline, the Notification Bar will inform the user.

ol.li: Notifications are created on the Upgrade Tool.
On the Upgrade Tool, click on tools.
click 'Edit' on the Deployment Inventory Tool.
(Optional) Enter the eTeams Issue in Notification eTeams Issue field.
Click the Notification Enabled checkbox. NOTE: This will be automatically clicked (enabled) if the eTeams Issue is valid and not does have Closed status.
Click the Save button. The notification will now show on the DE Object Store Tool

ul.li: Only Tools Team team members have permissions to add and remove notifications.
Once the issue has been resolved the notification can be removed by unclicking Notification Enabled checkbox or the check for the closed eTeams Issue will do this, from the Upgrade Tool.
